org.gridlab.gat.resources
Interface JobDescription

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
JobDescriptionCpi
public interface JobDescription
extends java.io.Serializable

Author:
rob An instance of this class describes a job to be run. It consists of a description of the "executable" (a SoftwareDescription), and of a description of the resource requirements of the job. The latter can be given as either a GATResourceDescription, or as a specific GATResource; only one of these may be specified.
